data.trans_hint: Ngày nay, đến cả những cậu trai 16 tuổi ở các góc phố cũng sẽ ngưỡng mộ những người được học đại học.
data.en_hint: Today even 16-year-old boys on street corners look up to those who attend university.
data.content_game_1: Today even 16-year-old boys on street corners look up to those who attend university.
data.answer_en_hint: Today even 16-year-old boys on street corners look up to those who attend university.

data.trans: Có đủ năng lực cần thiết làm gì
data.trans_hint: Anh ta có đủ năng lực cần thiết để trở thành một giáo sư.
data.en_hint: He's cut out for a professor.
data.content_game_1: He's cut out for a professor.
data.answer_en_hint: He's cut out for a professor.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta coi thường những người không được đi học đại học.
data.en_hint: He looks down on people who haven't been to university.
data.content_game_1: He looks down on people who haven't been to university.
data.answer_en_hint: He looks down on people who haven't been to university.

data.trans_hint: Cô thích mặc váy ngắn để khoe chân.
data.en_hint: She likes to wear short skirts to show off her legs.
data.content_game_1: She likes to wear short skirts to show off her legs.
data.answer_en_hint: She likes to wear short skirts to show off her legs.

data.trans: Nói về ai đó một cách thấp kém
data.trans_hint: Tôi ước gì các chính trị gia không nói về chúng tôi như thể chúng tôi không biết gì cả.
data.en_hint: I wish politicians wouldn't talk down to us as if we didn't know anything.
data.content_game_1: I wish politicians wouldn't talk down to us as if we didn't know anything.
data.answer_en_hint: I wish politicians wouldn't talk down to us as if we didn't know anything.

data.trans_hint: Chúng ta thật may mắn biết bao khi có một người quản lý luôn ủng hộ chúng ta trong phòng họp với các sếp.
data.en_hint: How lucky we are to have a manager who always backs us up in the meeting room with the bosses.
data.content_game_1: How lucky we are to have a manager who always backs us up in the meeting room with the bosses.
data.answer_en_hint: How lucky we are to have a manager who always backs us up in the meeting room with the bosses.

data.content: have a lot of time for
data.trans: Hứng thú, thích thú với ai/việc gì
data.trans_hint: Gần đây tôi đang rất hứng thú với marketing gần đây. Tôi nghĩ mình sẽ xin vào một công ty marketing nào đó.
data.en_hint: I have had a lot of time for marketing recently. I think I would find a job in some marketing agency.
data.content_game_1: I have had a lot of time for marketing recently. I think I would find a job in some marketing agency.
data.answer_en_hint: I have had a lot of time for marketing recently. I think I would find a job in some marketing agency.

data.trans_hint: Mặc dù Tim và tôi là đồng nghiệp, tôi luôn luôn coi anh ta như một người bạn.
data.en_hint: Even though Tim and I are colleagues, I always look on him as a friend.
data.content_game_1: Even though Tim and I are colleagues, I always look on him as a friend.
data.answer_en_hint: Even though Tim and I are colleagues, I always look on him as a friend.

data.trans_hint: Cùng nỗ lực hết sức để đạt được KPIs tháng này nào!
